attributes.title: Rooster Teeth: Bring on 2021
attributes.caption: If 2020 didn’t slow us down, then you better believe we’re ready to rock 2021 no matter what it brings! Stick around for another year of new shows and returning favorites.
attributes.description: If 2020 didn’t slow us down, then you better believe we’re ready to rock 2021 no matter what it brings! Stick around for another year of new shows and returning favorites.

attributes.title: World's Greatest Game of Civilization - Part 1
attributes.caption: Shrek, Hulk Hogan, Macho Man, Mr. Monopoly, Blackbeard, Jeanne D'Arc, Captain Picard and Bender go head to head in a battle for world domination!
attributes.description: Shrek, Hulk Hogan, Macho Man, Mr. Monopoly, Blackbeard, Jeanne D'Arc, Captain Picard and Bender go head to head in a battle for world domination!
attributes.display_title: World's Greatest Game of Civilization - Part 1

attributes.title: Blaine the GTA Online Super Villain
attributes.caption: Join Blaine as he becomes the maniacal super villain THE PUZZLER and leads the superhero team of Barbara, Gus, Jon, and Ky on a wild goose chase across Los Santos!
attributes.description: Join Blaine as he becomes the maniacal super villain THE PUZZLER and leads the superhero team of Barbara, Gus, Jon, and Ky on a wild goose chase across Los Santos!

attributes.title: The Rooster Teeth Guide to Austin!
attributes.caption: Join your Rooster Teeth tour guides on a romp around Austin with the Panasonic Lumix camera!
attributes.description:
Thanks to Panasonic LUMIX for sponsoring this video. Check out more details on the BGH1 Box camera: https://shop.panasonic.com/cameras-and-camcorders/cameras/lumix-interchangeable-lens-ilc-cameras/DC-BGH1.html
Join your Rooster Teeth tour guides on a romp around Austin with the Panasonic Lumix camera!
attributes.display_title: The Rooster Teeth Guide to Austin!

attributes.title: Aliens: Fireteam Elite Stream
attributes.caption: Join Jack, Alfredo, and Armando as they battle it out in Aliens: FireTeam Elite. Thanks to Aliens: FireTeam Elite for sponsoring this video. Check out Aliens: FireTeam Elite: https://bit.ly/aliensrt
attributes.description: Join Jack, Alfredo, and Armando as they battle it out in Aliens: FireTeam Elite. Thanks to Aliens: FireTeam Elite for sponsoring this video. Check out Aliens: FireTeam Elite: https://bit.ly/aliensrt

attributes.title: Cooking Studio Ghibli Food in Real Life! | Visual Feast
attributes.caption: Chef Mike tasks Geoff, Jon and Kayla with recreating dishes from Studio Ghibli films!
attributes.description:
Thanks to HBO Max for sponsoring this video. Sign up for HBO Max here: https://hbom.ax/visualfeast.
Chef Mike tasks Geoff, Jon and Kayla with recreating dishes from Studio Ghibli films!
attributes.display_title: Cooking Studio Ghibli Food in Real Life! | Visual Feast

attributes.title: We Built a HOVER DISC!
attributes.caption: Marcus and Chad are inspired by the KiwiCo Hover Disc to build their own GIANT version they can ride!
attributes.description: Thanks to KiwiCo for sponsoring this video. Learn more about KiwiCo and what we created today here: https://www.kiwico.com/hoverdiscrt. Marcus and Chad are inspired by the KiwiCo Hover Disc to build their own GIANT version they can ride!

attributes.title: Playing Resident Evil With Chris Redfield
attributes.caption: Matt Bragg plays Resident Evil 1 and 2 with Robbie Amell, the actor who plays Chris Redfield in the movie Resident Evil: Welcome to Raccoon City, out now!
attributes.description:
Thanks to Sony Pictures for sponsoring this video. Get tickets now to see Resident Evil: Welcome to Raccoon City - exclusively in movie theaters today: http://residentevil.movie/
Matt Bragg plays Resident Evil 1 and 2 with Robbie Amell, the actor who plays Chris Redfield in the movie Resident Evil: Welcome to Raccoon City, out now!
attributes.display_title: Playing Resident Evil With Chris Redfield

attributes.title: Anime or Ani-made up: Slice of Betrayal
attributes.caption: Rooster Teeth’s resident anime expert Kdin tests Eric and Hannah’s knowledge and wit in the first episode of this high-stakes gameshow.
attributes.description: Rooster Teeth’s resident anime expert Kdin tests Eric and Hannah’s knowledge and wit in the first episode of this high-stakes gameshow.
attributes.display_title: Anime or Ani-made up: Slice of Betrayal

attributes.title: Anime or Ani-made up: Bubble Pop Soda Adventure
attributes.caption: 2 seasoned Anime fans, Matt and Noël, go head to head to determine if these absurd plots are Anime or Ani-made up!
attributes.description: 2 seasoned Anime fans, Matt and Noël, go head to head to determine if these absurd plots are Anime or Ani-made up!
attributes.display_title: Anime or Ani-made up: Bubble Pop Soda Adventure

attributes.title: Anime or Ani-made up: Horny Doki Doki Racoon Love
attributes.caption: They may share one (1) brain cell, but can Kayla and Zoe share the title of Rooster Teeth’s Anime Champ? Find out in the 3rd and final episode of Anime or Ani-made Up!
